Package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils

  • Class
    Description
    CoreCollectors
    A factory of Collectors that allows to collect the stream of values into linked or sorted sets and the stream of entries and any other types into the linked or the sorted map.
    CoreDateTimeUtils
     
    CoreFileUtils
    Utility-class that invokes standard JDK utilities, but wraps IOException into IllegalStateException and creates missing parent directories.
    CoreStreamUtils
    Utility-class that provides methods to transform the stream or var-args-arrays of values into linked or sorted sets and stream or var-args-arrays of entries into linked or sorted map.
    MergeFunction
    This enumeration is used to handle the entries with the same key, when the stream of entries are collected into linked map or sorted map.
    PropertiesUtils
    Utility-class that simplifies the access to environment-variables, Java system-properties and the content of any other properties-files at file-system or in classpath.
